parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Groups

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Select the group's leader. Group locality can be checked with [[local]] command and group ownership with [[groupOwner]] command.

<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> important </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> An invalid combination can be provided to this command, e.g ''unitName'' '''not''' being part of ''group''. In that case:
* ''unitName'' will be [[leader]] of ''group'', but will not be able to command them
* if ''unitName'' is deleted or killed, [[leader]] of ''group'' will be [[objNull]] and will not automatically be reassigned.
</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> group [[selectLeader]] unitName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> group: [[Group]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[group]] [[player]] [[selectLeader]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Make unit a leader from server:<code><ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>[[group]] _unit, _unit] [[remoteExec]] ["selectLeader", [[groupOwner]] [[group]] _unit];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[commandFollow]], [[doFollow]], [[formationLeader]], [[formLeader]], [[isFormationLeader]], [[leader]], [[setLeader]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
